get.description: Retrieves all patients with transactions today that have at least one 'Done' service (consultation, laboratory, or medication) but not yet marked as 'Complete'.

200.description: List of patients with active billing

get.summary: Get billing details for a transaction
get.description: Fetches the billing breakdown for a transaction including consultation, laboratory, and medication details (if completed). Returns total billing with patient information.

get.summary: Fetch patients with returned consultations (today only)
get.description:
This endpoint retrieves patients whose consultations have a status of 'Returned' for the current date,
 *                  along with their related transactions, vitals, consultation, and laboratories.

200.description: List of patients with returned consultations

post.summary: Store or update a consultation and sync status with laboratories
post.description: Creates a new consultation record or updates it if the transaction_id already exists. Automatically updates amount if status is 'Done' and syncs laboratory statuses based on consultation status.

amount.description: Amount for the consultation (auto-set if status is Done)

post.description: Creates a new doctor fee entry in the library.
Updates an existing doctor fee entry.

delete.description: Deletes a doctor fee entry from the library.

get.description: Fetches a list of all doctor fees from the library.

get.summary: Fetch patients eligible for a guarantee letter
get.description: Fetches patients with completed transactions today that do not yet have a funded guarantee letter.

post.description: Stores a guarantee letter if funds are available, deducting billing from the remaining budget.

message.example: Not enough funds. Please add more funds before creating this billing. Remaining funds: 1500

get.description:
Retrieves patients who are qualified for laboratory services today,
 *                  excluding those who already have laboratory records marked as 'Done'.
 *                  Includes related patient, vitals, consultations, and laboratories.

200.description: List of patients qualified for laboratory

500.description: Failed to fetch qualified laboratory transactions

post.summary: Update status of laboratories under a transaction
post.description:
Updates the status (Pending, Done, Returned) of all laboratories associated with a given transaction.
 *                  If status is 'Returned', the linked consultation will also be updated to Returned.

404.description: No laboratories found for this transaction

post.summary: Store new laboratory records for a transaction
post.description:
Stores multiple laboratory records for a patientâ€™s transaction,
 *                  each with type, amount, and optional status.
 *                  Automatically links to a consultation if present.

get.description: Retrieves the list of all available laboratory services stored in the library.

post.description: Stores a new laboratory service in the library, including name and amount.
Updates an existing laboratory service in the library.

delete.description: Deletes an existing laboratory service from the library.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves patients with transactions that are qualified for Medication today,
 *                  excluding those whose medication status is already 'Done'.
 *                  It groups the transactions by patient and attaches related consultation data.

200.description: List of patients qualified for medication

post.description:
Stores a new medication record for a given transaction, including details such as
 *                  item description, quantity, unit, user, and amount.

post.summary: Update or create a medication status
post.description:
Updates or creates a medication status for the given transaction ID.
 *                  Status must be either 'Done' or 'Pending'.

get.summary: Get all patients  lastest transaction fetch on the master list module
fetch all patient need to assess

post.summary: Create a patient with representative, transaction, and vitals
post.description: This endpoint creates a new patient record, a representative, a transaction, and the patient's vital signs in one request.

201.description: Patient, representative, transaction, and vitals created successfully

message.example: Patient, transaction, and vitals created successfully.
Patient already has a record. Please add a new transaction instead.

get.summary: Fetch all the patients are qualified for consultation

post.summary: Add a new transaction and vitals for an existing patient

message.example: Transaction and vitals added successfully for existing patient.

put.description: Updates the details of a transaction by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the transaction to update

put.description: Update a patient's vital signs by ID
